amendment.description: Amendment sought to require an annual itemization of amounts spent by labor organizations for political activities and require that such information be made available on the Internet.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require an itemization of amounts spent by labor organizations for political activities and requires the availability of the reports via a public internet site or other publicly accessible computer network.

action.text: Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Paxon to the Shays amendment (A002).
On agreeing to the Paxon amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 150 - 248 (Roll No. 306).
